name: Useless Jewels Mod
description: A simple mod that introduces one new relic, the Useless Jewels, and three related cards.
credits: Thanks to Entilliumn for the idea and art assets for the mod. Also, thanks to Jedi, Alchyr, and all participants of the Slay the Spire #modding Discord channel, for being willing to help with questions that, in retrospect, seem obvious.
